entry.title: Boost Bitcoin circulation, Million Transactions Per Second with stronger privacy
entry.summary: In this context, ZmnSCPxj and Raymo are discussing a scenario in which a creditor could potentially sign a transaction that is not a valid MT (mutual timelock) or GT (guarantee transaction). Greg raises the question of how the creditor would be able to create such a transaction since they would require the issuer's private key. ZmnSCPxj confirms that there is nothing preventing the creditor from creating such a transaction, but notes that it would require cooperation from the issuer. The discussion highlights the potential risks and vulnerabilities in certain transaction scenarios.
